thread.title: Tax credits: What they are and how the cuts could affect you
thread.title_full: Tax credits: What they are and how the cuts could affect you - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Tax credits: What they are and how the cuts could affect you
text: Tax credits are cash payments to top up the incomes of low-paid workers, with additional payments for those who have children. They are intended to give people more incentive to work and to fight child poverty and they cost £30bn a year – about the same as the whole defence budget. So, they were an obvious target in Chancellor George Osborne’s search for the £12bn a year in “welfare” savings promised in the Conservative manifesto. Effects of the cuts to Tax Credits 6 show all
